content.detailedDescription:
Portland, june 30th, 2011, sunset (9:30pm) my apartment is on the 21st floor of a sw building apartment, facing north (st. helens view). last night i got home, and noticed fireworks popping up all over the valley, so i settled down to watch. the sun was setting, it was almost twilight, but there was still some orange and pink in the sky. the first ufo i saw was a pale orange light traveling horizontally over the mountain range. i am used to seeing planes take off and land in this area, so at first i thought that that is what it was. yet, its path was perfectly horizontal, no descent whatsoever. and it seemed to just be brushing the mountain top. then it did this kind of spiral staircase maneuver, and descended, somewhere east of the river, far to the north. before i could think, three star-like lights appeared over the city. i mean, they suddenly faded in, as if they were on a dimmer. they were all the same size, but one, i recall, was a bit brighter. the lights began to fade in and out, against a twilight sky. then more came... i don't know how many there were, but at one point there had to be at least 7. most of them were very faint. feathery, broken clouds rolled through, lighting up like a gauze sheet every time they passed over the objects, which were slowly drifting in a variety of directions. every few minutes i checked the relative positioning of the lights(like a constellation) to see if they were stationary, and i noticed that the shapes of the "constellations" were changing, so i deduced that the lights were drifting about, very slightly. then the lights, which were, again, so dim that they were often hard to see, turned slightly red. they would turn reddish colored and then revert back to whitish, slowly pulsing and moving. i decided to get my camera when a red orb drifted from the south and faded among the objects. when i got back they were still there, but the lights were too dim to appear on camera. something perhaps unrelated: a cloud formed literally around that central bright orb, and eventually blocked it from view. it is not unusual to see the shimmer of clouds forming close to the ground in this area, but it created an uncannily fitted ring, which slowly closed. when the cloud blew away, the orbs were no longer in that part of the sky. i looked for them everywhere, and suddenly they faded in just above my head and to the right, so that i was looking up at them. this is the very strange part... they were dim, and i am not surprised that others did not see these shapes, but my elevation gave me a good opportunity to view them up close... and i swear that i saw two triangles, all uneven sides and angles, the same exact shape, but with one and half times larger. they were stationary... and at first it just looked like two of the white star-like orbs, until i noticed that each was flanked by two dim red orbs, which i realized marked the corners of a craft. it could have been a triangular formation of three lights (x2, one big, one small), but i was able to discern an almost invisible darkening of the air in the triangular areas marked by the two sets of lights, and strange disruptions in the clouds, as if they were blowing against something. i admit, i got scared and went inside off my balcony at this point. when i came out, they were still there, but had faded a bit. following this part of the encounter, there were a few minutes of nothin'-much, and then a craft that, from my perspective, looked like a backslash (/), and flew like a backslash, never changing its diagonal tilt. it seemed that the slash had two orange lights, one at each end, and i couldn't tell if the lights were connected or perhaps two separate orbs flying in close tandum. it flew into view from north, then disappeared, before returning again from the north, and heading north and west. thats pretty much it. in addition, however, there was an other craft that floated past in the midst of it all, though i couldn't make out what it was, because the lights on it were flashing so quickly. it could have been a plane that i have not seen before.
please, let me know if you noticed anything unusual at twilight last night. i am really excited to have seen such a thing, and would love to be able to corroborate it. 

ps... there was none of the peaceful feeling that many people claim to feel when they see these things. at one point i was actually scared and had to go inside and turn on the tv. don't know if that has any meaning, but i felt nothing particularly friendly or unfriendly about the presence.
content.summary: Lots of ufo activity above downtown portland, very faint, involved red and white orbs, orange diagonal cylinders, triangular formations

para tomar potencia para partir y se inclino ya para dirigirse a alg���n sitio la partida y tuve miedo de ver porque cre���  que si produc���a alg���n destello muy brillante o algo as��� me afectara la vista y no quise ver, quite al mirada un segundo y luego volv��� a ver y efecto se hab���a ido, baje al patio de mi casa y ya m���s oscura la tarde segu���an pasando y alguno de ellos as��� con sus luces apagadas dejaba ver como si al girar saliera algo de el  y los otras no ten���an eso.De dos en dos
en esa ���poca de 1998 aqu��� en bogot���  al menos no era ���poca de celulares y menos  que tuvieran c���maras o video incluido como  hoy en d���a , ni siquiera ni eran comunes las c���maras digitales y yo menos tener una no ninguna de estos aparatos para tomar su foto pero la experiencia la tengo. no s��� que hicieron all��� ellos cuando pararon  por ahora es un misterio para m���. bueno luego les adjuntare unos esquemas dibujados y tomare unas fotos de esta ventana y el sitio para que me comprendan mejor si les parece. gracias espero me den su opini���n,. atentamente (name deleted)fg

translation:

and i think this, and as them being closer to my house, turned off their lights and i felt they would continue going over my house and actually did but they were like clouds of gas in the form of ovals, but off their lights, that is as small clouds gray ovals forms of two-pair is walking in pairs at a constant distance between these two and approximately constant speed and not very fast, and obviously no sound. the fact that i watched them pass over me, over my house and suddenly a couple of them approaching the missed the first, and behind this cloud of gas began to make swirl and i sensed that something was going to see . wait a second and look back on me now say a ufo is vedad if the metal plate on me and a height of approximately when the planes pass over my house, neither too high nor too low as they leave the airport because i live near the airport . this metal plate but still over my head, spinning on its axis, and it was completely flat, down just a black detail smaller than maybe it's his starting point the rest is just bare metal. this step is not whether 30 minutes in my thinking or something. then he started to shake this dish gave me the feeling that something was wrong and could fall, but then tend not know how you do that, to sit still and bowed, then shook understood that to take power and to leave already inclined to go somewhere the game and i was afraid to look because i thought if it produced a bright flash or something like that affect your view and i did not want to see, remove the eyes a second and then i saw he was gone and effect , down to the courtyard of my house, and darker in the afternoon were going and some of them with its lights off and let it look as if to turn out something from it and others did not have two at eso.De

content.summary: Ovni sobre mi hogar

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting in the yard talking when this bright light came into my view around 55 degree elevation heading southeast, altitude about 1500 to 2000 feet. the object continued southeast, became very dim and vanished. the object traveled perpendicular to the philadelphia landing pattern.My daughter photographed the object with her cell phone. the time of this event was 10:14, date: june 29, 2011. the sky was clear and the object made no audiable sound....
content.summary: Brilliant light traveling southeast, slowly dimmed and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I usually go out on my porch every night before i go to bed to just get some from fresh air and look at the stars.  i never see anything except for a few passing by planes but last night i saw something very strange.

i hadnt really been paying attention to the horizon, as i had been looking up most of the time.  i then saw two planes flying at the same exact speed, very close in altitude.  they were moving very fast too.  after seeing those planes flying so close together i thought that was very strange and i looked down and skimmed the horizon.  not too far from the direction that these planes came from i saw a very large light that at first i thought might have been a planet, but i had never seen it before.  it was very bright and very low on the horizon, but definitely above the mountains.  it sat stationary for about 5 minutes while i was on the porch and i then went to get my brother and grab a camera.  when i got back it was gone.

it looked very much like what a planet looks like, except 3-4 times larger in perspective.  whatever this was, it was in the atmosphere.  i'm very disappointed that i didn't get photos or video, but i find the two planes that i saw before seeing the object to be very strange.  almost as if they were buzzed to go check this thing out.
content.summary: Very large bright object, low on horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I live in brick nj. recently my family and i have been seeing a very
bright star like object that appears to be lower than a normal star
looking south. the object changes colors very rapidly and seems to be
spinning in place. i took some photographs with my 300 mm nikon d80
digital slr camera. to our amazement, we found out what the object
looks like up close when i opened the pictures. i have been seeing
reports online where people describe seeing similar lights.

the pictures i attached are jpg files but i also have them in original
raw format.
content.summary: Starlike object changing colors

content.detailedDescription: There were four of us looking out over our yard and into the grass field that lay beyond our yard. the total distance of our yard and the field was about 200 meters , and the width being about 75 meters. i noticed a bright light that appeared to be about 50 meters up in the air and about 100 meters from our position. i asked the other four if they saw the light and we all stared at it for a good 15- 20 seconds. it looked alot like a car headlight only maybe a little larger. as we watched it , suddenly it traveled horizontally 50 meters to the right, then about 60 meters to the upper left and then vansihed. this movement all occured in  about 250 ms or about 1/4 of a second. i do not recall if the light left a traceable line that indicated it proceeded upward or not. i do recall however, that the light was undoubtedly pointed in our direction and was unlike anything i have ever seen. i do not believe the object had any personel on board, but perhaps it could have been an apparatus of which to observe from a larger craft. though this was years ago and i was pretty young mayb e 12 or 13, we all remember this occurance vividly.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small bright light hovered,  then retreated in an instant

content.detailedDescription: I would like to know if like 17 light's in the florida everglades at night do the star's play tag with each other ?
content.summary: Star like playing tag going back and forward

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i, my neighbor and his grandson were sitting on our front porch which faces to the west.  i saw a round light appear in the western sky slowly move across the sky to the east. i pointed the object out to the others and we moved out into our front yard to view the object. the object appeared to be very high and moved at a slow steady pace and appeared to slightly zig zag, yet keep returning to a steady easterly course. the ofject appeared to be a round white light.   there were no "flashing lights nor sound".  when the object passed over our house we moved to the side of the house to keep the object in view.  as the object continued to the east it became dimmer and then just disappeared before it reached the eastern horizon.  tonight, the sky was very clear and the stars were very visible.  we also saw several aircraft "with flashing light" pass overhead, and we could also hear the engine noise from the aircraft.  the object took about four minutes to travel across the sky.
content.summary: Round white light moved across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, so i was driving home on june 30 at about 1045, and as i drove down the country road that i reside on i saw very faintly a large spotlight waving back and forth across the sky. i got to my house and went outside to investigate so i called my brother (another ufo researcher)whom lives not a half mile away to see if he was playing with his powerful laser or had at least heard of anything going on that would warrant a spotlight flying across the sky.  he had not heard of anything so we ended the phone call.  as i was bemused by the spotlight, i spotted a tiny spec relative in size to a far away star start to slowly move across the sky at about 25`-30` above the horizon. as i watched the object i was reminded of an experience a few weeks before where my sister-in-law saw, for all intents and purposes, the same object move in a similar fashion.  she called out my brother who then called me down to witness the object.  all three persons were in a coherent and sober mindset the night of both sightings.  we all saw the same movements and would even laugh independently when we saw it start to move.  however, on this night (june 30th), i watched seemingly the same object at about the same height above the horizon move what looked to be many, many miles (50-100?) across the sky, and very specifically stop, and move up maybe my out stretched thumb's length straight up.  the object then made a direct 180` turn and went back across the sky in the same fashion as before, but only a thumbs length above the first flight path.  by this time (approx 10:50pm) my brother and his wife were watching the same object, and had immediately spotted it as soon as they stepped outside. maybe 30 seconds later the object just faded out behind some thin clouds and was no longer visible.  keep in mind though that throughout these few minutes an enormous spotlight was waving back and forth in the same basic direction as the object.  however, not 90 seconds after the craft was no longer visible a definite human directed craft (airplane, as was visible from normal flashing airplane lights) flew straight down the flight path of the unidentified object, except it was traveling the opposite way.  the airplane was then visible a few seconds later down the exact same flight path coming from its original bearings.  i'm not sure if this was a second plane, or if it was the same plane after it had turned around.  

the first time we saw this phenomena it was an exalting experience, as we spotted and viewed the object moving in respect to a green laser we had setup.  however, the second time around was quite a bit more foreboding in the respect that at the same time as i witnessed this "craft" (as it was definitely not a star as stars don't move, and it was not a civilian or military aircraft as there were no light beacons flashing, and lastly it was not a satellite as i see them quite often, and have even seen the iss and spaceshuttle darting across the sky in low earth orbit.) there were a spotlight waving back and forth toward the area where the craft flew, and then subsequently either 2 planes separated or one plane by itself followed the exact same flight path as the object, except in reverse.  this is absolutely one of the top 3 most quizzical experiences of my life.  i am a rational person and have viewed the world through a scientist's eye since i can remember.  i have also spent many years being taught the various sciences, and even took the time to take physics and both chemistry 2 and 3 in the same year of high school .  science is my life and i am pretty good at it.  99% of the time i will be able to come up with some kind of an explanation for an idea, event or occurrence, however on this night (june 30th) the only explanation i have is that the object i saw was not piloted by humans.  it was most definitely a ufo, but its not so hard to not definitively identify something.  so, we must look at other attributes and qualities of the incident to make some kind of determination; for example the movements of the craft across the sky into a 180` turn.  that is not normal.  

unfortunately i did not have time to get our good camera and was not able to spot the object through my terrible phone camera.  

thank you for allowing me a credible place to post my story.  this is one experience i will never forget, and will continue to look for answers for the rest of my life.  i would also like to add that i live in a region of the appalachian mountains where there is much less light pollution than in many other places, and with my natural inclination for science, have subsequently spent my entire life looking at the night sky when possible.  i am well aware of the visible planets and major constellations, and this object was very abnormal for this area of the sky and time of year.  

                                                       sincerely,
                                                       j
content.summary: Starl-like ufo moved very dramatically

content.detailedDescription: We were having a fire in the backyard and sky watching, to the west we seen a bright white light coming towards us, i started to walk closer to get a better look and it was not a plane, or a satelite it was flying very low and it had no sound. i stood watching it for a few minutes with my daughter then it blinked twice, and it was like it shut its light off and we just couldn't see it, hard to explain, but its not like it flew off and just faded away, instead just shut its light off.
content.summary: Bright white hovering light

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I got a message from a friend at around 1:30am about the light. i saw the message 15 minutes later and immediately went out to see if it was still there. it was a strange white blinking light that didn't seem to be any kind of normal aircraft. it was noticeable as i looked off to the east, a bright but distant blinking orb of light. it would blink one light a few times, then it would blink a second light sequentially 3 times then go back to a single blinking light. it seemed to stay rather stationary for a while and then randomly change directions heading north east to south east and back again due east. after a few minutes it was doing connected circles in the eastern sky. it would do a counter clockwise circle connected into a clockwise circle headed in a south east direction. i called the neighbor out to have someone else to see what they thought of it. she just asked what it was and i told her i didn't know. a few moments later another light appeared out of nowhere and flew north to south very fast just in front of the first object. it was the same size, color, distance, and brightness as the first object. it was not a meteor, it left no trail and neither faded in or out as it passed. it came into sight and i immediately began to shout, "look!" i didn't believe my eyes. i was very excited now. we watched the object for almost two hours and spoke to neighbors who were also out at the time. they had seen it since 11pm, and had spoke to relatives that had seen it as far as 80 miles from our location. it stopped doing the figure eights and moved far off to the southwest. then a few seconds later a low flying airplane passed by. after the plane was gone it continued back to its previous location and continued the same flight pattern all the way off to the east until it vanished from sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object flew at very high altitudes, and did connected figure eight loops. it had one constant flashing white light, then a second sequential flashing light periodically.

content.detailedDescription: i was outside smoking as i usually do at night, i always look up because i have seen meteores satalights planets ect, i noticed a bright silver disc moving from west to east, i watched it for mabe 2 minutes, then it went straight up at a 45 dagree angle and dissapeared. there were no sound of any engine or turbines, no nav lights. a comercial aircraft was in its general area and had to notice the object, the comercial flight was heading north, northwest. this is not the first object i have seen. me and my son and a neighbor was outside and noticed 4 silver disc, we watched the disc for about 5 minutes and then they dissapeared one by one. 5 minutes later 2 f 14s or 15s flew right up under where they were at, this location was in lilburn georgia about 6 to 7 years ago in broad daylight, i have been through other things before also that i would only talk about in person.I have been in astronomy since i was ten , i was in law enforcement for years on night shift. i might want to join your team of mufon investigators.
content.summary: Silver glow very bright like venus

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my home office window, when my dog started barking as i looked out i saw a huge object headed north right over our home..Coming from the south east.It was low, as i watchted it, i seen three bright lights..One at the front two at the back..Shaped like a triangle..Then as it passed directly over me, i see underneaths its belly..It had a straight thin line of colored lights flashing from the front of it all way down the 2 ends of it...Underneath only..As i jumped up to grab my camcorder an run to the front porch, it was passing past the big trees in the field..So i filmed it from there..It still did not make a roaring sound like a low jet or anything like a low flying plane, the air was still an all i could hear was a rushing wind pass by..My dogs have been acting strange tonight.Iam sorta scared, cause my friend an i i seen a firey pillow like huge egg shaped object in 1994, that flew over our home in lexington ky, on eastland parkway, an it hoovered over us, for about a minute.An just  like this one, it moved away slowly unto it became a distant star..I filmed these on 8mm film then i took still photos of each still frame of film of the object, on a 27 in tv screen. i have alot more still images of it.
content.summary: Triangle object, huge..On light on each triangle shape, thin line of flashing colored lights directly underneaths its bellys as it passed over, it made a rushing wind like sound as it passed over, no loud roaring

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway in easton, pa when i looked up and noticed a bright orange light in the sky. it was northwest of me moving southeast towards morgan hill and southern new jersey. as we watched this light seemed to pause for about 30 seconds, not moving at all. then it started movin again, continuing on it's se path. as it moved it started to flicker, fade, and become smaller before finally disappearing somewhere around the delaware river. if i had to pick a town it disappeared over, it would be reiglesville, pa.
content.summary: Saw a bright orange light in the sky. it cracked in a slight south east movement slowing to a stop once before continuing and eventually fizzling out.

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my porch to smoke a cigarette and because i am interested in the night sky (i have an 8" dobsonian telescope) i was looking up. i noticed a solid bright starlike object moving from the north north west direction. i listened to see if there was any noise and there was none. i continued to watch it and it hesitated twice at a slower speed and then changed direction about 90��� heading due east. as it moved in that direction it slowly dimmed until it was no longer visible.
content.summary: No sound

content.detailedDescription:
While getting ready for bed at approximately 3am, i happened to look out the window towards the connerville are or more particularly nearly due west. at that point, i noticed a peculiar rotating light which was somewhat oval in nature. it rotated counter clockwise in multiple colors, including blue, purple, red, orange and was seemingly segmented. this rotating light also made rather erratic motions and flashed a very bright, white light. 
   using an imaginary plane, it made sine/cosine maneuvers as well as vertical maneuvers. this lasted for about 20 minutes. however, i did take into account, satellites and the planet mercury, due to the reddish color.
   after watching for said 20 minutes or so, it flashed extremely bright, shot up and disappeared. the same thing happened at about the same time on 30 june at about 3am, however, it was a little closer. one could clearly discern the segmented lights that rotated and flashed. 
   insofar as the altitude is concerned, i would estimate between 30,000-50,000 agl and it was approximately 30 degrees above the horizon, but further away than connersville, therefore, i am just using connersville as the nearest city reference. the only thing behind me directly, is a farm.
   at the time this occurred, admittedly, i felt a sense of wonderment, however, for a brief second or so, felt a sense of near terror. then thought it was pretty cool.
   the night was clear and comfortable.
content.summary: Orange, red, blue, flash of white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and my son was having trouble sleeping. so i fixed him a bottle and put him back to sleep. i stepped out the back door to smoke a cigarette, and to my surprise i saw a very bright red/orange light suspended in mid air.
my first thought was a plane but it didn't move. then i thought it was a helicopter, we have helicopters all the time, but there was no sound and it wasn't moving, so i called my wife. when she came out she was very upset, she was falling a sleep when i called her out. i asked her what that was, and she said it was an airplane. and wanted to go back in the house, but the we saw a plane in the horizon moving in a straight line and with blinking lights. she decided to go back in the house to attend our son who was awaken when i called her. i noticed the stars behind the object, and were very dim that is when i realized the object was hovering very slowly, then it began to move to the right for approximately 4 seconds and then it stopped. i thought of the i.S.S or maybe a satellite, but suddenly it moved back to the left and toward me, and it stopped. i started getting nervous,at that point the object seemed move to the right again and started to fade. it looked as if it was sinking sink into the sky, until it was very small like a star and then it just displaced at a very fast speed. i still don't know what it was but i wish there was more people around to witness it.
content.summary: Bright red/orange sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my boyfriend's house and the sky was a pretty pink color and it was close to sunset and so i took out my cellphone and took a picture of the horizon.  later as i looked at the picture, i realized there was an object in the upper right corner that i did not notice when i took the picture and so i zoomed the object in and could not come to any explanation as to what it might be.
content.summary: Unexplained object captured in sunset

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were standing in our yard looking east when we spotted a glowing red object coming from the south flying in a northeastern direction. we watched it fly silently through the sky above auburn, in at a slow pace. as it was becoming obstructed from view by my neighbors house i ran around to the other side to watch it. as it flew across the sky i happened to look straight up and i saw a large white object flying from the northwest to the southeast as it flew over head we were lucky enough to catch it on video. as it was flying off into the distance it faded away to nothing.
content.summary: Glowing red triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7:24pm to 7:40pm on june 27, 2011 i was on phone talking to a classmate and looking towards the s.W. direction when i noticed what appeared to be a round black dot in the sky. the object performed linear maneuvers, up, down and left to right. seemed very controlled and deliberate. clouds that evening were moving in what seemed to be a west to east direction. based on cloud movement which were few and the static location of trees in the surrounding area, i was able to determine that the object was truly moving independently. i explained to my classmate what i was seeing as it occurred. object drew closer. my classmate told be to get off the phone a take a picture. my cell phone camera was unable to do so as it kept wanting to focus on the fence in the near foreground. that is when i went inside and grabbed my digital camera and snapped a photo. i really didn't think i got the shot. seconds later, the object made a backwards letter j swoop and shot outward in a direction away from my position and disappeared beyond the horizon. i called my classmate back and described to her everything i saw.

today (june 30, 2001), i was downloading photos of my birthday that were taken on june 25, 2001 from the same camera i used to try and take pictures of the unknown object. all photos were downloaded to my computer. i decided to view the unknown object photo before deleting it when i noticed that i actually did catch something. the object appeared as i recalled. round and black. i decided to use the computers zoom-in function and was able to determine that the object is solid, possesses detail such as a domed top, maybe a flat bottom, circular in shape, two projections from beneath of one side and maybe some markings or definition on its side.

i'll be willing aid in your investigation and to talk to your third-party affiliates but only after i am made aware as to who they are.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed a bell or domed shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
En forma de v y las otras van chocandose unas a otras y la otra cada ves que mi abuela votaba a berme  pasavan y ella no las vey a y entonces yo gritava ve atras de ty i ella no vey a las luces misteriosas


translated:

v as the others go bumping each other and the other every time my grandmother voted berman pasavan and she does not then i gritava ay vey back of t i is not vey it to the mysterious lights
content.summary: Eran luces en forma de triagulo y otras una roja y una azul y tambien una luz que salia de las nuves

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself were returning from an ambulance run from krmc hospital, coming out of jackson ky i was driving and looked out the drivers side window  and saw a circular shaped silver object hovering in the air. the object had no wings, rotors, contrail or anything associated with an airplane. i could see nothing else around the object. the weather was warn about 88 degrees, sunny not a cloud in the sky. my wife didn't see the object due to being on the other side of the ambulance. we were about 1 mile out of jackson near the wolverine area on highway 15 north.I am a fire officer emt with the local fire dept and my wife is a firefighter paramedic. i have seen various aircraft over the years, i was also in the c.A.P and have been around aircraft for years, i could't identify this object.Myself and my wife are the only people who know what i saw. i wold like to remain anonymous as i feel i will be ridiculed for it.
content.summary: Silver in color about the size of a volkswagon

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in the back yard playing with our dogs.  some people were shooting fireworks nearby.  my husband brought to my attention a large glowing orange ball rising in the sky to the south.  i assumed it was a firecracker.  it looked like one of the flare type firecrackers, although it seemed to be moving too slowly.  it seemed brighter in the middle, and more orange toward the edges, like a flare or a flame looks.  it continued, and it became clear it wasn't a firecracker.  it crossed over our heads and continued until it was out of sight near the northern horizon.  as it travelled across the sky we talked about what it could be and quickly ruled out any kind of meteor. possibly a sattelite reflecting the sun?  my husband thought it went out of view behind the trees, and to me it appeared to dim and go out, but it could have been seeing it through the trees that gave it that appearance.  i can't really say how long it took, but my husband says less than a minute.  it stayed at a constant speed and at a constant brightness.  there was no noise.  a few minutes later we saw a plane fly over high enough that we couldn't hear the plane.  i would say the the oragne/amber light appeared 2 to 3 times larger than this plane appeared in the sky and traveled slightly faster.  we remain puzzled by this experience.
content.summary: My husband and i saw a bright glowing orange/amber ball cross the sky from south to north almost from horizon to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
It was the first cold blustery night of year - november 16, 1999 - i was returning something to k-mart about 7:20 p.M.  i usually take my time leaving the house, making certain i have everything i need because i live quite far out in the country.  in hindsight, on that particular night, i left the house very quickly - almost bolting out of the house; and i have no idea why i did that because i was only returning a pair of underwear to the store.  if i had left 20 seconds later, i would have missed what i was about to see.  i was in my pickup truck, pulled out of the driveway heading west.  in the wetern horizon i saw a very bright yellow light; then two and three appeared, and so on until there were eight.  my first quick thought was that they were landing lights from an airplane until i started seeing more and realized how big these lights were.  i immediately pulled off to the side of the road, turned off my radio, and stuck my head out the window.  there were large orbs about the color of the moon.  at first count there were seven; but after recounting i'm positive there were eight orbs.  as fast as i counted them, the eight orbs traveled across the sky in 20-30 seconds until they disappeared into the southern horizon.  the eight orbs took up almost 1/2 of the entire sky as they traveled.  they were in-line and did not change their positions but weren't spaced evenly apart.  there were 2 - a gap, then 3 - a gap, then 2, another gap, then 1.  the last orb was a little higher than all the others.  it did not appear to be a solid craft.  as they passed over the field, they were approximately 300 yards away and 300-500 ft in altitude.

my first solid impression was that this was a controlled flight and not anything man-made.  there was no propulsion sound or sonic boom which i thought there would be for something traveling that fast.  immediately after they disappeared from sight i turned my truck around and followed where i thought they may have crashed; expecting to see a police road block or flames.  after seeing nothing for a few miles, i decided to go to my friends' house to tell them what had just happened.  when i arrived jim and laura were reading.  they knew something was wrong as soon as they saw me.  i told them what happened and talked jim into coming with me to imvestigate where these orbs may have gone.  we went back to my house where i had first seen them in the sky - then drove east about 5 miles and didn't see any sign of a crash.  i took jim back to his house and talked for awhile; then proceeded to k-mart.  i felt as though the cashier must have known something was wrong because i must have been very wide-eyed after seeing such an unusual thing. when i returned home i called channel 4 news to ask if anyone else had reported anything strange in the sky.  the answer was no.  i went on-line and reported it on the ufo alert website.  while searching that website i found an astronomy student at the university of toronto.  i contacted him through his e-mail and he told me he had seen 7 orbs at the same time and place in the sky - he described them just as i had seen them. we wrote back and forth a few times but then lost touch.  i no longer know how to contact him. the next night i went bowling with my friend ken.  when i told him this story his jaw dropped because ken told me that earlier that day one of his employees sat him down and told him the exact same story i just told him.  this employee lived in akron, n.Y.  the only difference was that this man only saw 3-4 orbs.  ken gave me his employee's phone number and we talked on the phone a few times.  i no longer have his correct phone number but will contact ken and ask him to try and get in touch with this man to see if he would be willing to talk to mufon field investigators about his sighting.  this was all i thought about for weeks afterwards; and since that time i have read numerous books on ufo's and related topics. before this incident, i took no particular interest in the subject. i keep an extensive dream journal; and have had lucid dreams in the past.  on march 22, 1997, i had two out-of-body experiences.  i don't know where i went but it was extraordinary and amazing.  i haven't been able to repeat them since that time.
content.summary: Eight  bright spheres traveled west to east no noise 300 - 500  feet altitude in less than 30 seconds covering one-third of sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking around my apartment complex shortly after 10 pm...Not sure of exact time but it was before 10:30 pm on june 29, 2011. i live just off route 981 right near downtown mount pleasant (westmoreland county), pa., south east of pittsburgh about an hour travel time. 

while outside i was watching the many airplanes moving about in all different directions..Some i could see the underbellies of them and the twinkling lights so those ones were either taking off  from or landing in pittsburgh. others were higher but still i could tell they were airplanes due to the red and white twinkling lights under the wings.  

i could distinguish the stars in the sky as well and knew that the north star is the brightest, however, when looking in the southeast segment of the sky i saw two different phenomenons going on: one looked like a supernova star just twinkling away...Big bright white flaring spurts of light. while just off the side of it was a steady bright white light just hovering and not really twinkling but in a slow turn and hovering in place. i grabbed my bifocals to zoom in better and discovered it was more triangular when looking through my bifocal readers. i was certain then that it was a ufo. i watched it for at least another 10 minutes and it just stayed put in this location. i did not wait to see if it would zoom off as others have reported seeing in many other reports i've read in the past on this site. 

i am convinced that whoever they are and where ever they are from they seem to love hovering around southwestern pennsylvania during the month of june/july. i saw a triangular ufo in everson, pa (which is only 7 miles south of mt. pleasant.) this same general months time frame in 2010.
content.summary: Star like hovering object above line of visible airplanes traveling

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs before bed this morning. i saw a pulsating light to the n.E. moving so slow that it took atleast half hour to travel a distance that a helicopter could have done in under a minute. after i initially seen the object i took my dogs in android got my wife. at this time i retrieved my telescope. i set it up and proceeded to watch the object. when looking through the telescope i could see what appeared to be a circular object with red, green, blue and yellow lights pulsating and changing colors in no particular pattern that i could tell. after 30 minutes or so it slowly left my view in a westward direction. once this happend i preceeded inside, when i turned around and seen another identical object to the n.E. i also watched this object for about half android hour. it was headed east but had a slight angle heading upward as it moved. watched this object until trees blocked my view.
content.summary: Circular craft of unknown size, pulsating red, green, blue, & yellow, slowly moved across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing on my back stoop, and spotted a ball of light rising in front of me from the west, and tracking nearly straight up. i live in the traffic lanes of newark liberty airport, and have seen and photographed many planes going overhead... frankly, i'm a skeptic, and use this process to show how easy it is to mistake common, explainable things as exotic, unearthly things. 

i had my cellphone nearby, and started videotaping the white ball, about the size of jupiter, all the way across the sky and down behind the tree. i later confirmed this to be a flyover of the iss, at a very bright magnitude -3.7. anyway, i reviewed the footage and sat back, then glanced back at the area where the iss had emerged from. there, at roof level to the home across the street, was what i can only describe as an oval, canted, glowing jellyfish, about half the width of my outstretched index finger, slowly drifting silently from right to left on the western horizon. my first reaction was that my eyes had unfocused, and i rubbed them to rest them, but the object remained. i was elated! i had seen meteorites and bolides, but never something so unusual. it was like a bubble of soap, white top and bottom of the ellipse, with red pulsing light on the bottom tip that changed colors, and a few other greens and blues in the opposite (top) end.

i reset my video camera and caught a few seconds of video before the object brightened, then moved out of sight behind the neighbors roof. i ran to my front lawn, caught sight of it again, and snapped as many pics as i could before it disappeared.

i returned to my porch, and thought that i should get my better camera a from inside, at which point the object reappeared on the opposite side of the house, in a brief hole between two trees. i ran inside and got my slr, but the object was gone. i thought about chasing it down with my car, but didn't want to alarm my sleeping family. i shared the pics and video with my wife, who aptly called the object a blob. i have since watched the video on a larger monitor, and tweaked the pics a bit. i posted this to facebook, and almost immediately got confirmation from another witness in a nearby town that swears she heard engines on the thing, and says it's an advertising blimp. that was my first thought as well, but why at such an hour? i have since heard from a second witness in the same town as the first, who saw the same object at 3am the following morning.
content.summary: Following what turned out to be a flyover of the iss at 10:16pm, i saw this in the western sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to south padre island from laredo, texas, on friday around midnight. we were near zapata when sudennly my uncle, who was driving about 65 miles/hr, got startled by an object with bright non flashing lights. he told my cousing who was sitting in the front seat about it. then, i rushed to open the left window and looked out. to my amazement there was a round object moving west bound no higher than 2 to 3 stories over our head next to the road. i could not hear a sound. i couldn't see it take off it just disapeared out of my sight.  my cousin who saw it first approaching our vehicle described it as a silver triangle. when i was able to see it more clearly, it was already overhead and it looked like a disk with a lot of lights underneath. i was trying to explain what was going on to my 11 year old daughter but i couldn't identify the object as any of the known aircrafts. the three of us who saw the object felt very confused and surprised as none of us could explain what we saw. when we got to the hotel we asked my cousins, who were driving in another suv in front of us, if they saw anything unusual but said that they didn't.
content.summary: Ufo near zapata, tx. around midnight

content.detailedDescription:
Two redish round objects heading southwest.
estimate on altitude was approx 1500 -2000 ft . perhaps
3000 ft.  hard to tell. my estimate on the size
would be maybe the size of two houses each.
the object had a slight haze around it. perhaps like
 moisture in the air.
they were moving slowly. one object behind the other but off to one side.
not directly behind one another.
 i shut the lights off after pulling to the
 side of the road.I got out of the truck to get a better look. i then shut my engine off to listen for a type of noise. 
i heard nothing.
i thought perhaps helicopters,  nope, no noise.
i thought maybe small prop plane. nope, no noise.
 i proceeded to watch as they slowly moved south west. 
i then got in my truck and back it down the road to
 go tell my friend to come out and look. by then 
they were behind the trees so neither of us  could see
 them. i walked back up the road to see if
 i could see behind the trees, but they were gone.
 the night was crystal clear.  many stars were visible.
 i could see  a plane or two in the distant high altitude sky.
quite interesting.


i was driving slowly from my friends house.
why i noticed it. nice clear sky
 not sure what object was.
 reddish color like a flare, but not dropping.
motion was steady & consistant.
my feeling were, that i wanted to share what i saw.
lost sight when it got behind trees.
content.summary: This is what i saw

content.detailedDescription: We were in a parking lot on pine lake rd in laporte in.  i noticed a silver"plane" flying to the west but when i looked at it, there was no tail, and no wings although there did seem to be dark vertically rectangular areas in the middle near where wings would be.  it was flying low, at a descent altitude for planes, but flying horizontally, also much slower than a plane would appear to be moving at that altitude.  i was staring at it, trying to make out wings because i thought they had to be there. there was definitely nothing where the tail should be, we were looking at it from the side. i didn't say anything to my husband because i felt silly, but a few seconds after i noticed it he said "what is that thing?".  neither one of us had ever seen anything like it before.  we watched it for a couple of minutes till it was small in the distance to the west.  it was much too slender to be a blimp.  i still think there must be some explanation that doesn't involve aliens but i sure can't think of one.
content.summary: Wingless tail-less
